<MethodEndpoint
  method={"put"}
  path={"/api/2.0/project/{id:[0-9]+}/status"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Updates a status of a project with the ID specified in the request.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={undefined}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"id":{"description":"Project ID","type":"integer"},"status":{"description":"New project status (\"Open\", \"Paused\", or \"Closed\")","type":"integer"}}}}}}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
